attributes.action: Sack the labour politician Emma Dent Coad
attributes.background:
Labour MP Emma Dent Coad has made false and inflammatory allegations against the royal family.
This is purely out of despise for our Royal Family
As a woman of her position this is unacceptable and can nonlinear be trusted to represent the will and majority of her constituents and should be fired.

rejection.details: The UK Government and Parliament are not responsible for removing MPs from office because of their views or opinions.
